lead_paragraph: Andy Carroll scored with a trademark towering header to sink his former employers as West Ham United got 2016 off to a flying start with a 2-0 Premier League win over a typically inconsistent Liverpool on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Carroll Header Seals West Ham Win Over Liverpool
headline.main: Carroll Header Seals West Ham Win Over Liverpool
